name: Flying Rocket (itch) (VengeanceYT)
description:
Flying Rocket is a free addictive 2D space theme game where you can destroy asteroids or just not collide into them. 

This game features high graphics and is easy and fun to play!

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Press W - For moving up

Press S - For moving down

Press A - For moving left

Press D - For moving right

Press SPACE - For shooting

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Also note that this is a PC game and you will have to extract the files once the game is downloaded into a folder and then enjoy the game!
